item.title: 中国对世界银行的回应加倍彰显全球雄心
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特（Malcolm Scott），驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们将关注中国作为国际开发贷款人的十年经验。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. item.title: 莱坊称孟买住房价格为 15 年来最低
item.description: 一家房地产咨询公司的报告称，孟买的购房负担能力创下了 15 年来的新高，因为央行最近下调了利率，降低了抵押贷款成本。【原文：House purchase affordability in Mumbai hit a 15-year high following the central bank’s recent rate cuts that reduce mortgage costs, a property consultant’s report said.】

item.title: 拉布拉多狂热为中国消费者注入新活力
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Luz Ding 报道中国大型夏季购物节的体验，这次购物节的主角是中国本土的全球轰动人物。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Luz Ding reports on the experience of China’s big summer shopping festival, which was dominated by a homegrown global sensation.】

item.title: 太平洋地平线上前往美国的集装箱船数量增加
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁提高全球关税之前，企业竞相囤积货物，因此美国最繁忙的海运中心在未来几周内集装箱货运量有望增加。但目前还不清楚这将是进口潮还是仅仅是涟漪。【原文：The busiest US maritime complex looks to get an increase in container cargo in the next couple weeks as businesses race to stockpile ahead of global tariffs that President Donald Trump has threatened to increase. But whether it’ll be an import wave or merely a ripple is unclear.】

item.title: Uber 和 Waymo 在亚特兰大开始无人驾驶乘车服务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. on Tuesday will begin offering its customers driverless Waymo rides in Atlanta, making it the second market, after Austin, where the two companies are teaming up instead of competing against each other.】

item.title: 英国央行行长格林警告英国通胀率上升可能成为棘手问题
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）警告说，第二轮效应可能会使通胀率在更长时间内保持在3%以上，但她表示，这不应妨碍央行继续逐步降息。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene warned second-round effects may keep inflation above 3% for longer but said it should not prevent the central bank from pressing on with gradual interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 毛里求斯寻求浮动电站供应以避免停电
item.description: 毛里求斯正在寻求国际竞标，利用重油浮动发电厂供电，以提高产能，避免停电。【原文：Mauritius is seeking international bids to supply electricity from a floating plant using heavy fuel oil to bolster capacity and avoid blackouts.】

item.title: 据说 MMC 港口将申请 2012 年以来马来西亚最大的 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，MMC Port Holdings Sdn.公司正在推进其在马来西亚上市的计划，这可能是吉隆坡十多年来最大的一次首次公开募股。【原文：MMC Port Holdings Sdn. is pressing ahead with its planned listing in Malaysia, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the biggest initial public offering in Kuala Lumpur in more than a decade.】

item.title: 在无人驾驶竞赛中，Alphabet 的股价不及特斯拉
item.description: 投资者对无人驾驶汽车的热情高涨，但 Alphabet 公司的股价却没有反映出这种兴奋情绪。【原文：There’s a lot of investor excitement about driverless cars, yet Alphabet Inc.’s shares reflect little of that euphoria — even as its Waymo robotaxis proliferate in major US cities.】

item.title: 地缘政治未能破坏美股涨势，美股向创纪录目标迈进
item.description: 中东地区的停火大大降低了能源价格受到重大干扰的可能性，股市正朝着蓝天白云的方向发展。【原文：Equities are headed for a blue-sky scenario after the ceasefire in the Middle East drastically reduced the odds of a major disruption to energy prices.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发的裁员波及整个汽车零部件行业
item.description: SMT Automation 公司总裁埃莱娜-莫拉莱斯（Elena Morales）一直在为这家密歇根州的小型制造机械制造商迎来丰收年做准备。【原文：Elena Morales, the president of SMT Automation, had been preparing for a big year at the tiny Michigan maker of manufacturing machinery.】

item.title: BCG称瑞士财富流失速度快于亚洲竞争对手
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）的一份报告显示，瑞士作为世界顶级财富管理中心的地位正面临来自亚洲竞争对手的更严峻挑战。【原文：Switzerland is facing a stiffer challenge to its position as the world’s top wealth management center from Asian rivals, according to a Boston Consulting Group report.】

item.title: 欧洲债券销售堆积如山，表明一切照旧
item.description: 以色列和伊朗之间的停火虽然只是暂时的，而且可能稍纵即逝，但却吸引了两周来最多的借款人涌入欧洲一级债券市场。【原文：A ceasefire between Israel and Iran — although tentative and possibly fleeting — drew the biggest rush of borrowers in two weeks into Europe’s primary bond market.】

item.title: 华尔街称买入科技股，地缘政治风险常受控制
item.description: 本周伊始，中东地区的紧张局势愈演愈烈，华尔街的策略师们向美国股市投资者传达了一个信息：保持冷静，在市场下跌时买入。周二，在唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布以色列和伊朗停火后，这一呼吁显得很有先见之明。【原文：As tensions in the Middle East mounted to start the week, Wall Street strategists had a message for US equities investors: Stay calm and buy into market declines. The call looked prescient on Tuesday after President Donald Trump announced a ceasefire between Israel and Iran.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省省长希望在几周内提出新的石油管道建议
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省省长达尼埃尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）希望一家私营企业在几周内提出一条通往不列颠哥伦比亚省海岸的新石油管道，以争取成为加拿大政府国家重要项目清单上的首批项目之一。【原文：Alberta Premier Danielle Smith expects a private-sector firm to propose a new oil pipeline to the British Columbia coast within weeks in a bid to become one of the first entrants on the Canadian government’s list of nationally important projects.】

item.title: 石油暴跌推动美联储降息押注，国债攀升
item.description: 由于油价下跌和美联储官员的鸽派言论推动了对美国降息的押注，国债上涨。【原文：Treasuries gained as a decline in oil prices and dovish comments from Federal Reserve officials boosted bets on US interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 经济复苏停滞不前，瑞典将 2025 年经济增长预测减半
item.description: 瑞典政府在三个月内第二次下调了今年的经济增长预期，理由是消费前景疲软以及与美国贸易政策相关的风险。【原文：Sweden’s government lowered this year’s economic growth forecast for the second time in three months, citing a weaker outlook for consumption and risks linked to U.S. trade policy.】

item.title: 印尼达能达公司向印尼鹰航空公司贷款 4.05 亿美元
item.description: 印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）将向印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）提供 4.05 亿美元的贷款，以帮助这家陷入困境的国旗航空公司在未来几年内扭转财务状况并扩大机队规模。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara will extend a $405 million loan to PT Garuda Indonesia to help the distressed flag carrier turn around finances and expand its fleet in the coming years.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 与 DRW 共同参与数字资产融资回合
item.description: 区块链公司 Digital Asset Holdings LLC 已从 Citadel Securities、IMC、Optiver、高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Blockchain company Digital Asset Holdings LLC has raised $135 million from large financial firms including Citadel Securities, IMC, Optiver, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Virtu Financial, as Wall Street accelerates its focus on using the technology underlying cryptocurrencies to handle traditional assets.】

item.title: 北约的现金红利有可能成为欧洲失去的增长机会
item.description: 欧洲计划动用数万亿欧元用于新的国防开支，除非该地区能想出办法在这一过程中提高生产率，否则将错失良机。【原文：Europe’s plans to unleash trillions of euros in new defense spending will be a huge missed opportunity unless the region can work out how to raise productivity in the process.】

item.title: 距离特朗普签署贸易协议还有两周时间，压力与日俱增
item.description: 距离美国总统唐纳德-特朗普自行设定的与美国主要贸易伙伴达成协议的最后期限还有两周时间，但一些旨在达成协议以避免提高关税的会谈却在艰难地迈向终点。【原文：Two weeks from President Donald Trump’s self-imposed deadline to reach deals with the US’s major trading partners, some of the most-watched talks aimed at clinching agreements to avoid higher tariffs are struggling to get over the finish line.】

item.title: 德国经济乐观，企业前景创两年新高
item.description: 德国企业对经济的乐观情绪是两年多来最高的，因为公共开支即将增加，超过了对美国关税以及中东和乌克兰战争的担忧。【原文：German companies are the most upbeat about the economy in more than two years as an imminent boost to public spending outweighs concerns over US tariffs and wars in the Middle East and Ukraine.】

item.title: 法国国家巴黎银行在法国对抗 2.5 亿欧元税单
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）正在与法国当局争夺一笔约 2.5 亿欧元（约合 2.9 亿美元）的账单，法国政府称这笔交易涉嫌帮助外国投资者逃避数十亿欧元的股息税。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is fighting a bill of around €250 million ($290 million) French authorities say the government is owed over transactions that allegedly helped foreign investors dodge billions of euros in taxes on dividends, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲银行利润在 S&P 贸易战压力测试中面临打击
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司称，如果与美国的贸易紧张局势升级导致企业贷款恶化，欧洲银行的利润将受到侵蚀。【原文：European banks would see their profits eroded if an escalation of trade tensions with the US leads to souring corporate loans, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 英国食品价格进一步上涨，杂货商与成本负担作斗争
item.description: 英国超市的杂货价格通胀率达到了 15 个月以来的最高点，购物者为了节省开支，更多地选择自有品牌产品。【原文：Grocery price inflation has grown to the highest in 15 months across British supermarkets, with shoppers turning more to own-label ranges to save pennies.】

item.title: 沙特科技公司 Ejada 将在审批到期后重新申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯技术服务公司 Ejada Systems Ltd. 正计划重新向王国监管机构申请首次公开募股。【原文：Saudi Arabian technology services company Ejada Systems Ltd. is planning to reapply with kingdom’s regulator for its initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 诺和诺德晚于礼来数月在肥胖重灾区印度推出减肥药 Wegovy
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）将根据印度当地的需求调整其减肥药伟哥维（Wegovy）的定价，因为该公司希望在印度这个肥胖人口居世界第三位的国家抵御礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S will tailor the pricing of its blockbuster weight-loss treatment Wegovy in India to align with local demand, as it looks to fend competition from Eli Lilly & Co. in a nation with the world’s third-largest obese population.】

item.title: 德国内阁支持 2025 年预算草案和中期财政计划
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）内阁批准了政府 2025 年预算和中期财政计划，其中包括大幅增加新借款净额，以资助国家的军事建设。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s cabinet approved the government’s 2025 budget and medium-term finance plan, including a big increase in net new borrowing to help finance the country’s military buildup.】
